info.title: About DayWithout
info.subtitle: Your companion to build better habits and stay focused.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro
pomodoro.description: Manage your time with the Pomodoro technique. Work in focus blocks and take breaks to maximize your productivity without burning out.

habits.title: Habits
habits.description: Track your days without bad habits. Keep the streak and visualize your progress day by day to stay motivated.

games.title: MiniGames
games.description: Distract yourself from anxiety with quick and simple games designed to redirect your attention in difficult moments.

notification.workBody: You've completed your focus session. Take a breather.
notification.breakBody: Break is over. Time to get back to focus.
